participant_1.background:
I would have lunch with my childhood dog, Buddy.
I usually wake up early, eat a quick breakfast, and review my classes before heading out the door.
My social media life is pretty low-key, because I'm more focused on my studies.
i like to play soccer , draw and read asterix.
I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia.

participant_2.background:
I collect memories and seashells from my travels.
I try to keep myself fit and healthy, but I haven't been in a relationship for a long time.
i m a receptionist at a doctors office.
Baking is my passion, and I have a soft spot for dogs.
I'm interested in learning more about how to use social media to advertise my business.

content.text: Hello!  How are you doing today?
Hey there! I am doing well, thanks for asking. How about yourself?
I'm glad to hear that!  What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play soccer, draw, and read.  What about you?
I love to bake, travel, and collect memories and seashells.
Those all sound like great hobbies!  I have always wanted to learn how to bake.
Baking is a lot of fun!  It can be a little tricky at first, but once you get the hang of it, it's really rewarding.
I'll have to give it a try!  What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love to bake cookies!  I'm not sure if there's anything better than a warm, fresh-out-of-the-oven cookie.
Cookies are my favorite too!  I love chocolate chip cookies.
Chocolate chip cookies are always a classic!  I also love to make snickerdoodles and sugar cookies.
Those sound delicious!  I'm getting hungry just thinking about them.
Me too!  Maybe we should bake some cookies together sometime.
That would be fun!  I'd love to learn how to make some of your recipes.
Great!  We can set up a time sometime this week.
Sounds good!  I'll send you a message
